name: Micro Monster Trainers
description:
Micro Monster Trainers is a classic adventure games with idle feature that allows the player to improve your monsters anytime in the game.

  [Auto Fight --- Offline Bonuses]

Superior bonuses available when you are offline!
Incessant Adventure helps you to improve your creature more easily!

  [Legendary Creature & Evolution MEGA]

You can recover various classic creatures in the game and improve them with a lot of functions to increase their powers! Create your creature team immediately!

  [Creature Fight & Become TOP1]

Defeat the different Arena Champions to become the TOP1 in the world!

  [Special System & Z-Power]

You can also upgrade legendary creatures with Z-Power to activate their original strong powers!
